description: This trap should be sent whenever an action is
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-SWITCH-EV-PROP-MIB::prvtEvPropAction PRVT-SWITCH-EV-PROP-MIB::prvtEventPropagationEvent i 1 PRVT-SWITCH-EV-PROP-MIB::prvtEventPropagationRemotePeerType i 1 PRVT-SWITCH-EV-PROP-MIB::prvtEventPropagationRemotePeerID s EXAMPLE PRVT-SWITCH-EV-PROP-MIB::prvtEventPropagationActionID i 1

description: This leaf defines the type of event that will be monitored.

description: The peer type onto which the event is generated.

description: Defines the action to be take in case of an event.

variables.name: PRVT-SWITCH-EV-PROP-MIB::prvtEventPropagationRevertiveActionID
